languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас темный взгляд.{/n} "Ты смеешь задавать мне этот вопрос, {name}? Каждый раз, когда это корыто пронзает вуаль, я {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}остаюсь один на один{/d} со всеми кошмарами Той, Что Жаждет. Даже мне требуется вся выдержка и все силы, чтобы дать им отпор... и под рукой никогда нет того, с кем бы я мог порезвиться — только холодные стены и запертый шлюз!"

{n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас темный взгляд.{/n} "Ты смеешь задавать мне этот вопрос, {name}? Каждый раз, когда это корыто пронзает вуаль, я {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}остаюсь один на один{/d} со всеми кошмарами Той, Что Жаждет. Даже мне требуется вся выдержка и все силы, чтобы дать им отпор... и под рукой никогда нет того, с кем бы я мог порезвиться — только холодные стены и запертый шлюз!"

It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te fulmina con la mirada.{/n} «¿Te atreves a hacerme esa pregunta, {name}? Cada vez que esta embarcación atraviesa el velo, me quedo {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}a solas{/d} con las pesadillas de la Sedienta. Necesito todo mi vigor y mi fuerza para rechazarlas... y no tengo nadie con quien distraerme. ¡Solo paredes frías y una esclusa sellada!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te fulmina con la mirada.{/n} «¿Te atreves a hacerme esa pregunta, {name}? Cada vez que esta embarcación atraviesa el velo, me quedo a solas con las pesadillas de La Sedienta. Necesito todo mi vigor y mi fuerza para rechazarlas... y no tengo nadie con quien distraerme. ¡Solo paredes frías y una esclusa sellada!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋瞪着你。{/n}“你竟敢问我这个问题，{name}？每当这艘破船穿过面纱时，我只能{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}独自一人{/d}面对饥渴女士的噩梦。为了对抗这些噩梦，每次我都会耗尽所有的意志与力量，筋疲力尽……身边却没有任何人可以供我享受愉悦，只有冰冷的墙壁和密封的气闸！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋瞪着你。{/n}“你竟敢问我这个问题，{name}？每当这艘破船穿过面纱时，我只能独自一人面对饥渴女士的噩梦。为了对抗这些噩梦，每次我都会耗尽所有的意志与力量，筋疲力尽……身边却没有任何人可以供我享受愉悦，只有冰冷的墙壁和密封的气闸！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたを睨みつける。{/n}「あえてその質問をするのか、{name}？このブリッジがヴェールを突き破るたびに、俺はかの渇きたる女の悪夢とともに{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}ひとり取り残される{/d}。それと戦うには、全身全霊をかけなければならないのさ…それに、心を許せるような者は近くにはいなかった。あるのは冷たい壁と密閉されたエアロックばかりだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたを睨みつける。{/n}「あえてその質問をするのか、{name}？このブリッジがヴェールを突き破るたびに、俺はかの渇きたる女の悪夢とともに{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}ひとり取り残される{/d}。それと戦うには、全身全霊をかけなければならないのさ…それに、心を許せるような者は近くにはいなかった。あるのは冷たい壁と密閉されたエアロックばかりだ！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous jette un regard noir.{/n} « Vous osez me poser la question, {name} ? Chaque fois que ce maudit rafiot transperce le voile, je me {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}retrouve seul{/d}, cerné par les cauchemars de l'Assoiffée. Tout mon courage et toutes mes forces réunies ne sont pas de trop pour les repousser... et il n'y a jamais personne à portée de main pour me sustenter, rien que des murs froids et un sas verrouillé ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous jette un regard noir.{/n} « Vous osez me poser la question, {name} ? Chaque fois que ce maudit rafiot transperce le voile, je me retrouve seul, cerné par les cauchemars de l'Assoiffée. Tout mon courage et toutes mes forces réunies ne sont pas de trop pour les repousser... et il n'y a jamais personne à portée de main pour me sustenter, rien que des murs froids et un sas verrouillé ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai funkelt dich zornig an.{/n} "Ihr wagt es, mir diese Frage zu stellen, {name}? Jedes Mal, wenn dieser Kübel den Schleier durchsticht, bin ich {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}allein{/d} mit all den Albträumen von Ihr, die dürstet. Es kostet mich all meinen Mut und all meine Stärke, um sie abzuwehren ... Und es ist nie jemand da, der mich ablenken kann, nur kalte Wände und eine versiegelte Luftschleuse!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai funkelt dich zornig an.{/n} "Ihr wagt es, mir diese Frage zu stellen, {name}? Jedes Mal, wenn dieser Kübel den Schleier durchsticht, bin ich allein mit all den Albträumen von Ihr, die dürstet. Es kostet mich all meinen Mut und all meine Stärke, um sie abzuwehren ... Und es ist nie jemand da, der mich ablenken kann, nur kalte Wände und eine versiegelte Luftschleuse!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, ? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am left alone with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Hangi cesaretle bu soruyu soruyorsun {name}? Bu gemi örtüyü her delişinde Susayan'ın kâbuslarıyla {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}bir başıma kalıyorum{/d}. Direnmekten ne gücüm kalıyor ne takatim... Elimin altında oyalanacağım biri de yok! Anca buz gibi duvarlar, bir de hava kilidi!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glowers at you.{/n} "You dare to ask me that question, {name}? Every time this barge pierces the veil, I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Locked}left alone{/d} with all the nightmares of She Who Thirsts. It costs me all my fortitude and strength to fight them off... and there is never anyone at hand with whom I can indulge myself — only cold walls and a sealed airlock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Hangi cesaretle bu soruyu soruyorsun {name}? Bu gemi örtüyü her delişinde Susayan'ın kâbuslarıyla bir başıma kalıyorum. Direnmekten ne gücüm kalıyor ne takatim... Elimin altında oyalanacağım biri de yok! Anca buz gibi duvarlar, bir de hava kilidi!"
